model.interfaces

Interface GameEngineCallback


  • public interface GameEngineCallback
    Assignment interface for SADI to notify client of GameEngine events e.g. wheel spinning
    Author:
    Caspar Ryan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nextNumber(int nextNumber, GameEngine engine)
      called when the next number on the wheel comes up use this to update your display
      void result(int result, GameEngine engine)
      called when wheel has stopped, process bets here

    • Method Detail

      • nextNumber

        void nextNumber(int nextNumber,
              GameEngine engine)
        called when the next number on the wheel comes up use this to update your display
        Parameters:
        nextNumber - the current number as the wheel spins
        engine - a reference to the engine so the receiver can call methods as necessary
        See Also:
        GameEngine

      • result

        void result(int result,
          GameEngine engine)
        called when wheel has stopped, process bets here
        Parameters:
        result - the number the wheel stopped on
        engine - a reference to the engine so the receiver can call methods as necessary
